means: 打听，刺探（他人的私事）( pry的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Prying off the plastic lid, she took out a small scoop.
sentence.Network_cn: 她揭开塑料盖，拿出了一个小勺。

sentence.Network_en: Imelda might think she was prying.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾美达可能认为她在刺探别人的隐私。

sentence.Network_en: I'm sick of you prying into my personal life!
sentence.Network_cn: 我讨厌你刺探我的私生活！

超b级防盗锁是什么概念？_爱问知识人 ... 3.2 防钻 drilling resistant 3.3 防撬 prying resistant 3.4 防锯 sawing resistant.

entry.def: If someone pries, they try to find out about someone else's private affairs, or look at their personal possessions.

example.ex: We do not want people prying into our affairs...
example.tran: 我们不希望别人窥探我们的私事。

example.ex: Imelda might think she was prying...
example.tran: 艾美达可能认为她在刺探别人的隐私。

entry.def: If you pry something open or pry it away from a surface, you force it open or away from a surface.

example.ex: They pried open a sticky can of blue paint...
example.tran: 他们撬开了一个黏糊糊的蓝色油漆桶。

example.ex: I pried the top off a can of chilli...
example.tran: 我揭开一罐辣椒的盖子。

entry.def: If you pry something such as information out of someone, you persuade them to tell you although they may be very unwilling to.

example.ex: ...their attempts to pry the names from the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms.
example.tran: 他们试图从美国酒精、烟草和武器管理局那里打探到那些名字

sentences.sentence: "he flipped through my letters in his nosy way"
"the snoopy neighbor watched us all day"

auth_sentence.content: Constant prying or suspicion will have the opposite effect.

auth_sentence.content: There are just too many prying eyes, everywhere, to avoid this fact.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are just too many prying eyes, everywhere, to avoid this fact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are just too many prying eyes, everywhere, to avoid this fact.
